name: AT&T Phonebook File
summary: Learn about .PBB files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: PBB files can be opened using CellBrite Content Manager by selecting Contacts → Open Phonebook. They may then be exported to Outlook or Outlook Express by selecting the menu option Contacts → Open Phonebook.

description: Phonebook file used by various mobile phones; contains backup data exported by software at a local AT&T store; typically stored on a USB drive after an AT&T representative has exported the phonebook file.
